title: Casper Ruud's Family Comes First
summary: Casper Ruud is a tennis player from Norway who is playing in the Australian Open tournament in Melbourne. His wife Maria is about to have their first baby, a daughter. Ruud says that if Maria goes into labor, he will leave the tournament right away to be with her. He thinks family is more important than tennis. Ruud won his first match easily and is happy to play, but he always keeps his phone on in case Maria calls. He wants to travel with his wife and baby to future tournaments. Ruud's dad, who used to play tennis, is his coach and helps him. Ruud feels excited to have a new person to play for.

background_read: Casper Ruud is a professional tennis player from Norway who has done very well in big tournaments like the US Open and French Open. He is currently playing in the Australian Open, which is one of the four major tennis events. Ruud is about to become a father for the first time, and he is balancing his sports career with his family life. This article shows how athletes sometimes have to make tough choices between work and personal events.
